Attribute.name: RemoteProviderID
Attribute.HelpText: The provider ID of the remote server

Attribute.name: ProtocolVersion
Attribute.HelpText: The version of the protocol being used (examples: SAML2.0, Libv11)

Attribute.name: NameIDQualifier
Attribute.HelpText: The qualifier of the nameID of the subject

Attribute.name: NameIDValue
Attribute.HelpText: The value of the nameID of the subject

Attribute.name: NameIDFormat
Attribute.HelpText: The format of the NameID of the subject

Attribute.name: SessionID
Attribute.HelpText: The ID of the current session

Attribute.name: FederationID
Attribute.HelpText: The ID of the federation

Attribute.name: UserID
Attribute.HelpText: The identifier of the user corresponding to the session

Attribute.name: FederationType
Attribute.HelpText: The type of the federation that is being created or deleted (SP/IdP)

Event.name: LocalAuthentication
Event.unusedAttributes: RemoteProviderID ProtocolVersion NameIDQualifier NameIDValue NameIDFormat FederationID FederationType
Event.HelpText: Authentication of a user

Attribute.name: AuthenticationMechanism
Attribute.HelpText: The authentication mechanism used during local authentication

Attribute.name: AuthenticationEngineID
Attribute.HelpText: The identifier of the authentication engine used during local authentication

Event.name: LocalLogout
Event.unusedAttributes: RemoteProviderID ProtocolVersion NameIDQualifier NameIDValue NameIDFormat FederationID FederationType
Event.HelpText: Logout of a user

Event.name: CreateUserSession
Event.unusedAttributes: RemoteProviderID ProtocolVersion NameIDQualifier NameIDValue NameIDFormat FederationID FederationType
Event.HelpText: Creation of a user session after a successful login

Attribute.name: AuthenticationMechanism
Attribute.HelpText: The authentication mechanism used during local authentication

Event.name: DeleteUserSession
Event.unusedAttributes: RemoteProviderID ProtocolVersion NameIDQualifier NameIDValue NameIDFormat FederationID FederationType
Event.HelpText: Deletion of a user session after logout

Event.name: CreateUserFederation
Event.HelpText: Creation of a user federation between two remote servers

Event.name: DeleteUserFederation
Event.HelpText: Deletion of a user federation between two remote servers

Event.name: CreateActiveUserFederation
Event.HelpText: Creation of an active federation after successful login

Event.name: DeleteActiveUserFederation
Event.HelpText: Deletion of an active federation after logout

Event.name: UpdateUserFederation
Event.HelpText: Modification of a user federation

Attribute.name: OldNameIDQualifier
Attribute.HelpText: The nameID qualifier before the update took place

Attribute.name: OldNameIDValue
Attribute.HelpText: The nameID value before the update took place

Category.name: ProtocolFlow
Category.HelpText: The set of events corresponding to general protocol flow

Attribute.name: Binding
Attribute.HelpText: The binding used to send the message (SOAP, POST, GET, Aritifact,...)

Attribute.name: Role
Attribute.HelpText: The role of OIF during the protocol step performed (ex. Service Provider/ Identity Provider/Attribute Authority/..)

Attribute.name: UserID
Attribute.HelpText: The identifier of the user in this protocol step

Attribute.name: MessageType
Attribute.HelpText: The type of the message (ex. SSOLoginRequest/SSOLoginResponse/SSOLogoutRequest/...)

Attribute.name: AssertionVersion
Attribute.HelpText: The version number of the assertion corresponding to this event (ex. 2.0)

Attribute.name: IssueInstant
Attribute.HelpText: The value of the "IssueInstant" attribute of the assertion

Attribute.name: Issuer
Attribute.HelpText: The value of the "Issuer" attribute of the assertion

Attribute.name: AssertionID
Attribute.HelpText: The value of the "AssertionID" attribute of the assertion

Event.name: IncomingMessage
Event.unusedAttributes: NameIDQualifier NameIDValue NameIDFormat SessionID FederationID AssertionVersion IssueInstant Issuer AssertionID
Event.HelpText: Protocol message received

Event.name: OutgoingMessage
Event.unusedAttributes: NameIDQualifier NameIDValue NameIDFormat SessionID FederationID AssertionVersion IssueInstant Issuer AssertionID
Event.HelpText: Protocol message sent (Success only)

Event.name: AssertionCreation
Event.HelpText: Creation of an assertion (Success only)

Event.name: AssertionConsumption
Event.HelpText: Consumption of an assertion (Success only)

Category.name: Security
Category.unusedAttributes: ModuleId TargetComponentType Target Resource Roles RemoteProviderID ProtocolVersion NameIDQualifier NameIDValue NameIDFormat SessionID FederationID
Category.HelpText: Events relating to security operations such as encryption and signing

Attribute.name: Type
Attribute.HelpText: The type of cryptographic data being processed (XML, String)

Event.name: CreateSignature
Event.HelpText: Creation of a digital signature

Event.name: VerifySignature
Event.HelpText: Verification of a digital signature

Event.name: EncryptData
Event.HelpText: Encryption of data

Event.name: DecryptData
Event.HelpText: Decryption of data

Category.name: ServerConfiguration
Category.unusedAttributes: ModuleId TargetComponentType Target Resource Roles RemoteProviderID NameIDQualifier NameIDValue NameIDFormat SessionID FederationID
Category.HelpText: Events relating to server configuration changes

Attribute.name: PropertyName
Attribute.HelpText: The name of the configuration property

Attribute.name: PropertyType
Attribute.HelpText: The type of the property (examples: PropertiesList, PropertiesMap, String, Boolean)

Attribute.name: PeerProviderID
Attribute.HelpText: The ID of the trusted provider associated with the modified property (If the modified property does not correspond to a trusted provider, this attribute is empty.)

Attribute.name: PropertyContext
Attribute.HelpText: The location of the property in the configuration

Attribute.name: Description
Attribute.HelpText: Description of the trusted provider

Attribute.name: OldValue
Attribute.HelpText: The value of the property before the configuration change

Attribute.name: NewValue
Attribute.HelpText: The value of the property after the configuration change

Attribute.name: ProviderType
Attribute.HelpText: The type of the provider (examples: sp, idp, sp idp)

Event.name: ChangeCOT
Event.unusedAttributes: ProtocolVersion PropertyName PropertyType PeerProviderID PropertyContext Description OldValue NewValue ProviderType
Event.HelpText: Change in the trusted providers configuration file (Success only)

Attribute.name: COTBefore
Attribute.HelpText: The contents of the federations configuration file before the change

Attribute.name: COTAfter
Attribute.HelpText: The contents of the federations configuration file after the change

Event.name: ChangeServerProperty
Event.unusedAttributes: ProtocolVersion PropertyName PropertyType PeerProviderID PropertyContext Description OldValue NewValue ProviderType
Event.HelpText: Modification of a server configuration property (Success only)

Attribute.name: ServerConfigBefore
Attribute.HelpText: The server configuration before the change

Attribute.name: ServerConfigAfter
Attribute.HelpText: The server configuration after the change

Event.name: ChangeDataStore
Event.unusedAttributes: ProtocolVersion PropertyName PropertyType PeerProviderID PropertyContext Description OldValue NewValue ProviderType
Event.HelpText: Modification of the data stores configuration (Success only)

Attribute.name: DataStoreBefore
Attribute.HelpText: The data stores configuration before the change

Attribute.name: DataStoreAfter
Attribute.HelpText: The data stores configuration after the change

Event.name: CreateConfigProperty
Event.HelpText: Creation of a new configuration property (Success only)

Event.name: ChangeConfigProperty
Event.HelpText: Modification of the value of an existing configuration property (Success only)

Event.name: DeleteConfigProperty
Event.HelpText: Deletion of a configuration property (Success only)

Event.name: CreatePeerProvider
Event.HelpText: Creation of a new provider to the list of trusted providers (Success only)

Event.name: UpdatePeerProvider
Event.HelpText: Modification of the information on an existing provider in the list of trusted providers (Success only)

Event.name: DeletePeerProvider
Event.HelpText: Deletion of a provider from the list of trusted providers (Success only)

Event.name: LoadMetadata
Event.unusedAttributes: ProtocolVersion PropertyName PropertyType PeerProviderID PropertyContext OldValue NewValue ProviderType
Event.HelpText: Loading of trusted provider metadata (Success only)

Attribute.name: Metadata
Attribute.HelpText: The provider metadata loaded

Event.name: SetDataStoreType
Event.unusedAttributes: ProtocolVersion PropertyName PropertyType PeerProviderID PropertyContext Description NewValue ProviderType
Event.HelpText: Modification of the type of a data store (Success only)

Attribute.name: NewDataStoreType
Attribute.HelpText: The new type of the data store

Attribute.name: DataStoreName
Attribute.HelpText: The name of the data store being modified (examples: user data store, federation datastore)
